name: cs834-f16
tagline: Classe home page for ODU CS 734/834 Intro to Information Retrieval, Fall 2016
body:
### ODU CS 734/834 for Fall 2016.
Instructor: [Michael L. Nelson](http://www.cs.odu.edu/~mln/) <mln@cs.odu.edu> 

Office Hours: Thursdays 3-4 and by appointment

Time: Thursdays 4:20pm - 7:00pm

Place: Dragas, r. 1117 (with option to move rooms after the first class)

[Syllabus](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/master/syllabus.txt)

### Course Books
* [Search Engines: Information Retrieval in Practice](http://www.search-engines-book.com/) (Required [free PDF download from the authors](http://ciir.cs.umass.edu/irbook/))
* [Introduction to Information Retrieval](http://nlp.stanford.edu/IR-book/) (Recommended)
* [Modern Information Retrieval: The Concepts and Technology Behind Search](http://grupoweb.upf.es/WRG/mir2ed/home.php) (Recommended)

### Class Email list
* [https://groups.google.com/group/cs834-f16](https://groups.google.com/group/cs834-f16)

### Class Schedule (subject to change)
* Week 1 - September 1 - Administrivia ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/week1.ppt)), Chapters 1 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap1.pptx), [pdf](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap1.pdf)), 2 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap2.pptx), [pdf](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap2.pdf))
* Week 2 - September 8 - Chapter 3 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap3-mln.pptx))
* Week 3 - September 15 - Student Presentations 1
* Week 4 - September 22 - Chapter 4 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap4-mln.pptx))
* Week 5 - September 29 - Chapter 5 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap5-mln.pptx))
* Week 6 - October 6 - Student Presentations 2
* Week 7 - October 13 - (no class)
* Week 8 - October 20 - Chapter 6 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap6-mln.pptx))
* Week 9 - October 27 - Chapter 7 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap7-mln.pptx))
* Week 10 - November 3 - Student Presentations 3
* Week 11 - November 10 - Chapter 8 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap8-mln.pptx))
* Week 12 - November 17 - Chapter 9 ([ppt](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/slides/chap9-mln.pptx))
* Week 13 - November 24 - (Thanksgiving -- no class)
* Week 14 - December 1 - Student Presentations 4
* Week 15 - December 8 - Chapter 10 
* Week 16 - December 15 - Exam Week -- Student Presentations 5

### Assignments (subject to change)
* Assignment 1: [due 2016-09-22](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/assignments/assignment1.ppt)
* Assignment 2: [due 2016-10-13](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/assignments/assignment2.ppt)
* Assignment 3: [due 2016-11-10](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/assignments/assignment3.ppt)
* Assignment 4: [due 2016-12-08](https://github.com/phonedude/cs834-f16/blob/master/assignments/assignment4.ppt)
* Assignment 5: due 2016-12-15
